TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE ORG and LANGUAGE ( PERSON ) ( “ the General Directorate ” ) decided to partially expropriate the applicant ’s land located in the PERSON district of GPE . The applicant only found out about this expropriation in DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought a civil action before ORG for additional expropriation compensation .
CARDINAL . On DATE the title to the property was transferred to ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant MONEY ( TRL ) as additional compensation , plus interest at the statutory rate .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the first - instance court ’s judgment .
CARDINAL . The applicant subsequently initiated execution proceedings before ORG to obtain her additional compensation .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant received a partial payment of CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL NORP liras ( TRY ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought a case before ORG in respect of ORG outstanding debt and the interest rate that should be applied to that amount .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG held that ORG had an outstanding debt of TRY CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL , payable with an interest rate of PERCENT running from DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG appealed the judgment of ORG . On DATE ORG upheld that judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG paid the applicant TRY ORG to discharge its outstanding debt , together with interest .
